# Hachimi

> Hachimi (哈基米) is a gamified mobile habit-tracking app where every habit spawns a unique virtual kitten. Built with Flutter and Firebase. Users build habits through focus sessions while raising cats that evolve based on cumulative hours. Optional cloud AI companion (MiniMax M2.5 or Gemini 3 Flash). Free, no ads, source available. Available on Android and Google Play.

Official website: hachimi.ai. Source code: github.com/sinnohzeng/hachimi-app.

## Core Features

- [Cat Parenting System](https://hachimi.ai/en#features): Adopt a kitten from 3 randomly generated candidates. 15 pelt patterns, 19 colors, 21 eye colors, 6 personalities. XP-driven 4-stage evolution (0/20/100/200 cumulative hours)
- [Focus Timer](https://hachimi.ai/en#features): Countdown and stopwatch modes with persistent Android foreground service. Earn XP and 10 coins per minute of focus
- [Progress Tracking](https://hachimi.ai/en#features): Weekly trend charts, 91-day activity heatmap, and paginated session history
- [AI Companion](https://hachimi.ai/en#faq): Optional cloud AI cat chat and auto-generated diary. Choose between MiniMax M2.5 or Google Gemini 3 Flash. Privacy disclosure required on first enable
